Articles.Content:
A basic list of achievements/ goals for people to try and complete, feel free to post what you\'ve done.

Difficulties:

(NC) Not completed

(E)asy - Use MechJeb

(N)ormal - Use SAS

(H)ard - 100% Manual

(U)ltra Hard - No instrumentation (F2)

Shuttle

[list type=decimal]

[li]Lift off[/li]

[li]Leave atmo[/li]

[li]Achieve Kerbal orbit[/li]

[li]Return to Kerbal[/li]

[li]Return to Kerbal (without crashing)[/li]

[li]Reach the Mun[/li]

[li]Orbit the Mun[/li]

[li]Land on the Mun[/li]

[li]Land a rover on the Mun[/li]

[li]Return from the Mun[/li]

[li]Reach Minimus[/li]

[li]Orbit the Minimus[/li]

[li]Land on Minimus[/li]

[li]Land a rover on Minimus[/li]

[li]Return from Minimus[/li]

[li]Reach the Sun[/li]

[li]Orbit the Sun[/li]

[li]Return from the Sun[/li]

SpacePlane

[list type=decimal]

[li]Take off[/li]

[li]Cross the ocean[/li]

[li]Reach 2nd KSC[/li]

[li]Land[/li]

[li]Land on a runway[/li]

[li]Orbit Kerbin (in atmo)[/li]

[li]Leave atmo[/li]

Easter Eggs

[list type=decimal]

[li][/li]

[li][/li]

Let me know if I missed anything and I\'ll add it.

And finally my own achievements...

Shuttle

Lift off - U

Leave atmo - N

Achieve Kerbal orbit - N

Return to Kerbal - N

Return to Kerbal (without crashing) - N

Reach the Mun - N

Orbit the Mun - N

Land on the Mun - E

Land a rover on the Mun - E

Return from the Mun - N

Reach Minimus - N

Orbit the Minimus - N

Land on the Minimus - E

Land a rover on the Minimus - NC

Return from the Minimus - NC

Reach the Sun - N

Orbit the Sun - E

Return from the Sun - NC

SpacePlane

Take off - N

Cross the ocean - N

Reach 2nd KSC - NC

Land - N

Land on a runway - NC

Orbit Kerbin (in atmo) - NC

Leave atmo - NC

My idea of a 'rover'

LAND ON THE SUN 8)

You need some spaceplane achievements, methinks. Maybe landing on the runway, flying across the ocean, landing at the second KSC, etc. Oh, and don\'t forget the monoliths and arches, either.

I don\'t use mechjeb or rovers, so my list is fairly simple.

[list type=decimal]

[li]Lift off - H[/li]

[li]Leave atmo - H[/li]

[li]Achieve Kerbin orbit - H[/li]

[li]Return to Kerbin - H[/li]

[li]Return to Kerbin (without crashing) - H[/li]

[li]Reach the Mun - H[/li]

[li]Orbit the Mun - H[/li]

[li]Land on the Mun - N[/li]

[li]Land a rover on the Mun - NC (never used rovers)[/li]

[li]Return from the Mun - N[/li]

[li]Reach Minimus - NC[/li]

[li]Orbit the Minimus - NC[/li]

[li]Land on the Minimus - NC[/li]

[li]Land a rover on the Minimus - NC[/li]

[li]Return from the Minimus - NC[/li]

[li]Reach the Sun - H[/li]

[li]Orbit the Sun - H[/li]

[li]Return from the Sun - NC[/li]

I\'d suggest adding achievements or level of achievement for single-stage flight, i.e. without decoupling anything during flight or otherwise losing mass other than expended fuel. Naturally, this will usually only count for 'return' objectives.
